entry.title: Some useful Git configuration options
entry.summary:
This is a short list of some useful Git config options and commands that are not used that often, but could spare you a lot of headaches and googling time.
To ignore some untracked files without using .gitignore file, you can add patterns to exclude to......
entry.content:
This is a short list of some useful Git config options and commands that are not used that often, but could spare you a lot of headaches and googling time.

git ignore without .gitignore file

To ignore some untracked files without using .gitignore file, you can add patterns to exclude to .git/info/exclude file.

Check this SO question for more details and priority that git uses when excluding files.

entry.title: Some useful Git commands
entry.summary:
This is a short list of some useful Git commands that are not used that often, a Git cheat sheet if you will.
Remove remote branch locally
Remove branch on remote repo ...
entry.content:
This is a short list of some useful Git commands that are not used that often, a Git cheat sheet if you will.

git subtree

git subtree push --prefix <folder> origin <branch>

removing remote git branches

Remove remote branch locally

git branch -d -r <remote>/<branch>

Remove branch on remote repo

git push <remote> --delete <branch_name>
